How to draw birds in Adobe Draw

Blair wrote this on 13 Oct

Here are the slides from a brown bag I did for @wearemeld in Sydney, Australia. I taught everyone how to draw on their iPad using Adobe Draw. The drawing birds activity was something I learnt from one of my internet heros @davegray.

The team at Meld decided that Adobe Draw was more suitable than Paper by Fifty Three because it preserved layers and vectors and exported nicely to Adobe Illustrator or Photoshop. It was heaps of fun spending time with such talented, creative people.

Shout out to @dom_rin for setting it up.

#drawing
